==== Ubuntu Bangladesh ====

I am working with Ubuntu Bangladesh team from mid 2012.

I work for:

* Helping & troubleshooting Local users Ubuntu Linux related problems at Ubuntu Bangladesh <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/groups/ubuntubd/|Facebook group]]</nowiki>, Telegram, IRC for the last 4 years.
* Distributing Ubuntu CDs and ISOs. 
* Admin of Ubuntu Bangladesh Facebook group, Launchpad group, Telegram group.

==== Future Plans ====
 
* Organizing programs and workshops at universities.
* Continuing the CD distribution program.
* Encouraging and helping my users to start using Ubuntu.
